original_title: The Allman Brothers Band: Idlewild South
overview: The 3CD, Super Deluxe Edition adds 12 tracks not included on the original release. Bonus tracks are a combination of live tracks, studio cuts and outtakes. The entire album is also available in 5.1 Surround Sound on the Blu-ray plus additional tracks. The Allman Brothers' second album, is a mixture of chunky grooves and sophisticated textures. It showcases both Gregg Allman's and Dickey Betts' skills as songwriters. This classic album includes the hit 'Midnight Rider.'
title: The Allman Brothers Band: Idlewild South
